title: Memes
description: A unit of cultural information, such as a cultural practice or idea, that is transmitted verbally or by repeated action from one mind to another.

title: Story
description: A connected account or narration, oral or written, of events of the past; history.

title: News
description: Information about recent events or happenings, especially as reported by means of newspapers, websites, radio, television, and other forms of media.
